node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 16 日出現症狀。患者在大圍隆亨邨救世軍隆亨長者之家任職清潔工，與院友沒有直接接觸。
node.detail_en: The patient has no travel history and developed symptoms on July 16. She works as a janitor at Salvation Army Lung Hang Residence for Senior Citizens, Lung Hang Estate, Tai Wai, and has no direct contact with the residents.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
The Salvation Army Lung Hang
Residence For Senior Citizens
groups.description_zh: 大圍救世軍隆亨長者之家的院友、廚師、清潔工、文職人員及其家人共十多人先後確診。
groups.description_en: This clusters accounts for the residents of The Salvation Army Lung Hang Residence For Senior Citizens, as well as related cooks, janitors, administrative staff, and family members. The cluster numbers at over ten people.

node.location_en: Sin Sam House, Lung Hang Estate
Wing Sam House, Lung Hang Estate
